skills.name: Daredevil Impulse
skills.target_range: {{pp|650 to 960|1;4;8;12;16|formula=650 + 77.5 every breakpoint, capped at 960. Maximum range to dash from.}}
skills.blurb: {{ci|Samira}} builds a combo by hitting attacks or abilities unique from the previous hit. Samira's attacks in {{tip|melee}} range deal additional {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}}. Samira's attacks against enemies affected by {{tip|immobilize|Immobilizing}} effects {{tip|airborne|knock them up}}.
description: {{sbc|Innate - Style:}} '''Samira's''' damaging [[basic attack]]s and [[champion ability|abilities]] against at least one enemy {{tip|champion}} different from the previous damaging hit made against champions grant her a ''Style'' [[stack]] for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. The duration {{tt|refreshes|Does not have to be unique from previous hit to refresh duration}} on subsequent damaging attacks and abilities against enemy champions.
'''Samira''' gains {{as|{{pp|3.5*(x-1) for 7|0 to 6|key=%|label1=''Style'' stacks}} {{sti|'''bonus''' movement speed}}|ms}}.

{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Samira's''' basic attacks against targets in {{tip|er|icononly = true}} 200 range use her blade, becoming {{tip|projectile|non-projectile}}. Basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}} with the blade and {{ai|Blade Whirl|Samira}}, {{ai|Wild Rush|Samira}}, and the slash and explosives of {{ai|Flair|Samira}} deal {{as|{{pp|2 to 19}} {{as|(+ {{pp|3.5 to 10.5|key=%}} AD)}} '''bonus''' magic damage|magic damage}}, increased by {{as|{{pp|0 to 100 by 10|0 to 100 by 10|key=%|key1=%|label1=target's '''missing''' health}}|health}}.

Whenever '''Samira''' uses a basic attack against an {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} target, the attack is empowered to have an {{tip|uncancelable windup}}, be modified to deal the {{as|attack's damage}} over 6 strikes in {{fd|0.5}} seconds, and cause '''Samira''' to {{tip|dash}} into her {{sti|attack range}} from the target if they are nearby, though not through terrain. If the target is a {{tip|monster}} or is {{tip|airborne}}, the attack also {{tip|airborne|knocks them up}} for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.

The empowered attack {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Samira's''' basic attack timer, is affected by {{tip|critically strike|critical strike}} modifiers, applies {{tip|on-hit}} effects only once, and cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Style: Samira's damaging basic attacks and champion ability against at least one enemy champion different from the previous damaging hit made against champions grant her a Style stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. The duration refreshes on subsequent damaging attacks and abilities against enemy champions.
Samira gains 0 to 6 ‒ undefined bonus movement speed.
Innate: Samira's basic attacks against targets in er 200 range use her blade, becoming non-projectile. Basic attacks on-hit with the blade and Samira's Blade Whirl, Samira's Wild Rush, and the slash and explosives of Samira's Flair deal 2undefined − 19undefined (based on level) (+ 3.5% − 10.5% (based on level) AD) bonus magic damage, increased by 0 to 100 by 10 ‒ undefined.
Whenever Samira uses a basic attack against an immobilized target, the attack is empowered to have an uncancelable windup, be modified to deal the attack's damage over 6 strikes in 0.5 seconds, and cause Samira to dash into her attack range from the target if they are nearby, though not through terrain. If the target is a monster or is airborne, the attack also knocks them up for 0.5 seconds.
The empowered attack resets Samira's basic attack timer, is affected by critical strike modifiers, applies on-hit effects only once, and cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
skills.notes:
* The stack count is represented by the grades [[File:Samira Rank E.png|20px|border|link=]] [[File:Samira Rank D.png|20px|border|link=]] [[File:Samira Rank C.png|20px|border|link=]] [[File:Samira Rank B.png|20px|border|link=]] [[File:Samira Rank A.png|20px|border|link=]] [[File:Samira Rank S.png|20px|border|link=]] to the left of her [[health bar]] for '''Samira''' herself, and a stack counter underneath the bar that is visible to all players.
* The empowered attack can trigger on {{tip|immobilize|immobilizes}} from both ally and enemy sources.
** Self-applied or allied-applied {{tip|immobilize|immobilizes}} from the enemy '''will''' count for the empowered attack to trigger.{{bug|2}}
** Those applied by the ''neutral'' team (e.g. {{uis|Dragon}} initial knock back) '''can''' be targeted.
** It cannot trigger against enemies knocked {{tip|airborne}} by a {{ui|Blast Cone}} triggered by anyone.{{bug|2}}
* The empowered attack's interaction with [[Crowd control#Immunity|immunities to crowd control]]:
** It ''will not'' trigger against {{tip|displacement immune}} targets. If the empowered attack had already gone off, the knock up will ''not'' be resisted, thus interrupting the target's actions.{{bug|2}}
** It ''will'' trigger against {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immune}} targets.
*** The knock up will however be partially resisted against {{ai|Black Shield|Morgana}}; only the disabling portion (airborne debuff) will be negated but not the displacement (forced movement).{{bug|2}}
*** The knock up will be resisted by {{ai|Riposte|Fiora}}, but the ability does not trigger its on-{{tip|immobilize|immobilization}} effect.{{bug|2}}
* The empowered attack will not apply the knock up against {{tip|suspension|suspended}} enemies.
* The empowered attack will only apply the knock up if the target is still {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} or {{tip|airborne}} upon being hit. It will not apply if they are no longer disabled when hit.
* The empowered attack cannot be used against a target with a {{tip|spell shield}}.
* The application of the knock up can occur on any of the missiles of the empowered attack if it had not already occurred on the first missile.
** A missile that is parried by {{ai|Riposte|Fiora}} or is {{tip|dodge|dodged}}, {{tip|block|blocked}}, or missed while '''Samira''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}} '''cannot''' apply the knock up.
* While {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}, '''Samira''' cannot {{tip|dash}} into range to use the empowered attack. She can only use it if her target is within her {{sti|attack range}} while under this condition.
* The on-target cooldown will apply even if the empowered attack is parried.
* The empowered attack rolls {{tip|critical strike}} for each shot of the flurry.
* The {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} dealt with the blade is {{tip|default damage}}. The empowered attack is first 1 instance of {{tip|basic damage}} and then 5 instances of {{tip|default damage}}.
** The bonus damage does not apply to [[structures]].
* The empowered attack is unaffected by {{stil|attack speed}} modifiers.
* {{iis|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} ''Phantom Hit'' and {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} bolts will not apply the {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, since it is {{tip|on-hit}} of specifically the melee attack casts.
* Attacks with the gun and blade do not count as different attacks for stacking ''Style''.
* Basic attacks using the blade are still classified as {{tip|ranged}}.
* The melee attack's range condition is unaffected by {{stil|attack range}} modifiers (e.g. {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}}).
** Blade range is calculated edge-to-edge just like basic attack ranges are, hence both '''Samira''' gaining bonus [[size]] or her target increases the total distance at which '''Samira''' can attack them with the blade.
* Since the {{tip|airborne|knock up}} requires an exterior source to {{tip|immobilize}} the enemy, {{ri|Aftershock}} will be swapped with {{ri|Grasp of the Undying}} for '''Samira''' at the start of the game.
* Since {{ais|R|Samira}} cooldown is static, {{ri|Ultimate Hunter}} will be swapped with {{ri|Ravenous Hunter}} for '''Samira''' at the start of the game.
* Abilities blocked by {{tip|spell shield|spell shields}} will still grant '''Samira''' ''Style'' stacks.
* '''Samira''' still gains ''Style'' stacks from damaging attacks and abilities landed against {{tip|clone|clones}}.

skills.name: Flair
skills.range: {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} {{tt|950|Gun shot missile range}} / {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} {{tt|400|Cone range strictly forward, cone origin is X units behind Samira}}
skills.angle: {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} {{tt|X{{degree}}|Cone angle, cone origin is X units behind Samira}}
skills.blurb:
{{ci|Samira}} fires a shot, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to the first enemy hit.
If this ability is cast towards an enemy in melee range, Samira will instead slash with her sword, dealing {{as|physical damage}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Samira''' fires a shot in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy it hits.
If a targetable enemy is in front of '''Samira''' at the time of starting the cast, she will slash with her blade in a cone instead, dealing the same damage to all enemies within.

Casting ''Flair'' during {{ai|Wild Rush|Samira}} will cause '''Samira''' to deploy explosives along her path which detonate upon the end of the dash, dealing the same damage to enemies within the covered distance. This can be done while performing {{ai|Blade Whirl|Samira}} or {{ai|Inferno Trigger|Samira}} despite ''Flair'' being disabled during them.{{bug|2}}

''Flair'' can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|25|100}} '''bonus''' physical damage}} and both the shot and slash {{tip|applies lifesteal|apply}} {{stil|life steal}} at {{fd|66.6}}% effectiveness.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Samira fires a shot in the target direction, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it hits.
If a targetable enemy is in front of Samira at the time of starting the cast, she will slash with her blade in a cone instead, dealing the same damage to all enemies within.
Casting Flair during Samira's Wild Rush will cause Samira to deploy explosives along her path which detonate upon the end of the dash, dealing the same damage to enemies within the covered distance. This can be done while performing Samira's Blade Whirl or Samira's Inferno Trigger despite Flair being disabled during them.Unknown value: bug / 2
Flair can critically strike for (+ IE 25%) bonus physical damage and both the shot and slash apply Unknown value: stil / life steal at 66.6% effectiveness.
skills.notes:
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} on the shot and {{tip|area damage}} on the slash and explosives.
** {{stil|Life steal}} will always benefit from the damage dealt at {{fd|66.6}}% effectiveness and does not take into account of the ability's [[spell effects]], whereas on the other hand for {{tip|omnivamp}} does, and it will modify the {{tip|healing}} accordingly.
* The slash and explosives roll their {{tip|critical strike}} against each target individually.
* The shot and the slash do not count as different abilities for stacking {{ai|Daredevil Impulse|Samira|Style}}.
* The explosives do not benefit from {{stil|life steal}}.
* '''Samira's''' next attack after using ''Flair'' will occasionally come out faster.{{bug|2}}
* '''Samira''' can use {{ai|Wild Rush|Samira}} during ''Flair's'' cast time.
* ''Flair'' will fire or slash from wherever '''Samira''' is at the end of the cast time.
** '''Samira''' will always slash in her facing direction, and she will turn to face the target direction only once at the start of the cast time.
* ''Flair'' can be buffered {{fd|0.5}} seconds before it comes off cooldown.
* Only the shot will be destroyed by {{tip|projectile|projectile-intercepting}} effects.
* The explosive placement is illustrated in {{ai|Wild Rush|Samira}} regardless of whether ''Flair'' is available.
** The VFX always covers the the full dash's distance even if {{ai|Wild Rush|Samira}} is interrupted mid-dash.

skills.name: Blade Whirl
skills.blurb: {{ci|Samira}} slashes around her for 1 second, damaging enemies twice for {{as|physical damage}} each and destroying any enemy {{tip|projectile|missiles}} that enter the area.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Samira''' spins her blades around herself over {{fd|0.75}} seconds, destroying all hostile non-{{tip|turret}} {{tip|projectile|projectiles}} that enter or are created within the area for the duration.

'''Samira''' slashes twice during ''Blade Whirl'', each one dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all nearby enemies. The first slash occurs immediately and the second one occurs at the end of the duration.
'''''Samira''' cannot attack nor cast {{ai|Flair|Samira}} during Blade Whirl. Casting {{ai|Inferno Trigger|Samira}} will end Blade Whirl early.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Samira spins her blades around herself over 0.75 seconds, destroying all hostile non-turret projectiles that enter or are created within the area for the duration.
Samira slashes twice during Blade Whirl, each one dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies. The first slash occurs immediately and the second one occurs at the end of the duration.
Samira cannot attack nor cast Samira's Flair during Blade Whirl. Casting Samira's Inferno Trigger will end Blade Whirl early.
leveling: {{st|Slash Damage|{{ap|20 to 80}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|20*2 to 80*2}} {{as|(+ 160% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
skills.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage from one slash.
* While the ability has a cast time - the cast time has no effect on the ability's usability. All effects begin immediately and '''Samira''' can move throughout. 
* ''Blade Whirl'' can be buffered {{fd|0.5}} seconds before it comes off cooldown.
* Both slashes count as the same ability for stacking {{ai|Daredevil Impulse|Samira|Style}}.
* The effect ending early includes the second slash not being performed, if applicable.  
* Entering {{tip|stasis (buff)|stasis}} will also end ''Blade Whirl'' early.
** Other item actives and channeling {{si|Teleport}} or {{si|Recall}} will ''not'' end the effect early.
* '''Samira''' can ignore the lockout for {{ai|Flair|Samira}} and basic attacks if she uses {{ai|Wild Rush|Samira}} and queues up {{ai|Flair|Samira}} and/or a basic attack at the start of it.{{bug}}

effects.str:
• Slash Damage: (+ 80% bonus AD)
  • Total Damage: (+ 160% bonus AD)

skills.name: Wild Rush
skills.range: {{tt|650|Dash distance}} / {{tip|er|icononly = true}} {{tt|800|Dash hitbox length}} / {{tip|er|icononly = true}} {{tt|-150|Dash hitbox behind Samira}}
skills.blurb: {{ci|Samira}} dashes through an enemy or ally, slashing enemies she passes through dealing {{as|magic damage}} and gaining {{sti|Attack Speed}} for 3 seconds.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Samira''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} in the direction of the target enemy or enemy {{tip|turret|structure}}, slashing all enemies within her path to deal them {{as|magic damage}} and gain {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 3 seconds.
{{tip|Takedown|Takedowns}} on enemy {{tip|champions}} reset ''Wild Rush's'' {{sti|cooldown}}.
'''''Samira''' can cast {{ai|Flair|Samira}} or {{ai|Inferno Trigger|Samira}} during Wild Rush. Using {{ai|Blade Whirl|Samira}} will buffer it to cast at the end of the dash.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Samira dashes in the direction of the target enemy or enemy structure, slashing all enemies within her path to deal them magic damage and gain bonus attack speed for 3 seconds.
Takedowns on enemy champions reset Wild Rush's cooldown.
Samira can cast Samira's Flair or Samira's Inferno Trigger during Wild Rush. Using Samira's Blade Whirl will buffer it to cast at the end of the dash.
skills.notes:
* ''Wild Rush'' does not deal its damage to turrets.
* ''Wild Rush'' prioritizes targeting champions over turrets.
* ''Wild Rush'' can be buffered {{fd|0.5}} seconds before it comes off cooldown.
* {{ai|Inferno Trigger|Samira}} will be buffered to cast at the end of the dash if {{ai|Flair|Samira}} was cast during the dash.
* Casting {{si|Flash}} during ''Wild Rush'' will interrupt the dash but deal damage to nearby enemies at the location.
** If {{ai|Flair|Samira}} was cast during this time, an explosive will also be placed at that location.
* ''Wild Rush'' will also reset if '''Samira''' kills or gets assist credit on a {{tip|clone}} that dies (to hostiles).{{bug|2}}

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 20% bonus AD)
  • Attack Speed: %

skills.name: Inferno Trigger
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Samira}} unleashes a torrent of shots from her weapons, wildly shooting all enemies surrounding her 10 times over 2 seconds, each shot dealing {{as|physical damage}} and applying {{sti|lifesteal}}. Each shot can also {{tip|critically strike}}.
Samira can only use this ability if her current ''Style'' rating is S.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Samira''' unleashes a torrent of shots from her weapons for {{rutngt|2.25}}, '''reducing''' her {{as|movement speed}} by {{as|30%|ms}} and rapidly shooting at all nearby enemies over {{rutngt|2}} at sporadic times in {{tt|{{fd|0.2}}-second intervals|on average; total of 5 intervals of 0.231 and 5 of 0.198 seconds}} each, dealing {{as|physical damage}} with each shot, reduced by 75% against {{tip|minions}}.
Each shot can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|75|100}} '''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{tip|applies lifesteal|applies}} {{stil|life steal}} at {{fd|66.6}}% effectiveness.

''Inferno Trigger cannot be cast unless at maximum [[File:Samira Rank S.png|20px|border|link=]] {{ai|Daredevil Impulse|Samira|Style}} stacks (6), and all stacks will be consumed at the end of the effect. A nearby {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy is required to cast this ability, and targets do not have to be visible to be shot at.''

'''''Samira''' cannot attack nor cast {{ai|Flair|Samira}} and {{ai|Blade Whirl|Samira}} during Inferno Trigger, but she can still move. Inferno Trigger will end prematurely by all forms of {{tip|interrupt|interrupting}} {{tip|crowd control}} as well as {{tip|disarm}}.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Samira unleashes a torrent of shots from her weapons for 2.277, reducing her movement speed by 30% and rapidly shooting at all nearby enemies over 2.013 at sporadic times in 0.2-second intervals each, dealing physical damage with each shot, reduced by 75% against minions.
Each shot can critically strike for (+ IE 25%) bonus physical damage and applies Unknown value: stil / life steal at 66.6% effectiveness.
Inferno Trigger cannot be cast unless at maximum File:Samira Rank S.png Samira's Style stacks (6), and all stacks will be consumed at the end of the effect. A nearby visible enemy is required to cast this ability, and targets do not have to be visible to be shot at.
Samira cannot attack nor cast Samira's Flair and Samira's Blade Whirl during Inferno Trigger, but she can still move. Inferno Trigger will end prematurely by all forms of interrupting crowd control as well as disarm.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage Per Shot|{{ap|0 to 20}} {{as|(+ 50% AD)}}|Total Damage Per Target|{{ap|0*10 to 20*10}} {{as|(+ 500% AD)}}|Minion Damage Per Shot|{{ap|0*0.25 to 20*0.25}} {{as|(+ {{ap|50*0.25}}% AD)}}|Total Damage Per Minion|{{ap|0*0.25*10 to 20*0.25*10}} {{as|(+ {{ap|50*0.25*10}}% AD)}}}}
skills.notes:
* '''Samira's''' facing direction remains as it had been or, if she is moving, towards that direction during ''Inferno Trigger''.
* The {{stil|movement speed}} reduction stacks additively with other {{as|movement speed}} bonuses. 
** It is a negative bonus, not a {{tip|slow}}, and is thus not reduced by {{tip|slow resist}}.
* ''Inferno Trigger's'' area of effect is fixed around '''Samira'''.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage of one shot.
* ''Inferno Trigger'' will not end if there are no enemies that remain in range.
* ''Inferno Trigger'' can be buffered {{fd|0.5}} seconds before it becomes unsealed or off cooldown.
* The shots roll {{tip|critical strike}} against each target individually.
* The bottom of the [[Summoner|player's]] screen will have a fiery visual effect while '''Samira''' is at ''S'' rank and ''Inferno Trigger'' has at least one rank.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage Per Shot: (+ 50% AD)
  • Total Damage Per Target: (+ 500% AD)
  • Minion Damage Per Shot: (+ % AD)
  • Total Damage Per Minion: (+ % AD)

skills.name: Taunt
icon: Samira_splash_coin.png <!-- Use Samira_splash_coin.png when calling ability info on other pages -->
description: '''Samira's''' [[Emoting|taunt]] {{tip|lockout|prevents}} her from inputting attack commands and casting non-movement abilities, and she may only interrupt it herself with a movement command. After 3 seconds without interruption, she will toss a [[File:Samira_splash_coin.png|20px|link=]] coin in the direction she is facing.

If she has at least {{g|1}}, the coin deals {{ccs|{{sti|{{as|1 true damage}}}}|true}} to the first enemy champion hit, triggering {{ai|Daredevil Impulse|Samira}} but granting them {{g|1}} of '''Samira's''' [[gold]].
If cast within {{tt|1100|Estimated, pending for test}} range of a {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy champion, '''Samira''' will turn to face towards the closest one to perform the animation.
'''Samira's''' ''Taunt'' can target and hit dead enemy champions, granting them {{g|1}} but not triggering other effects.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Samira's Emoting prevents her from inputting attack commands and casting non-movement abilities, and she may only interrupt it herself with a movement command. After 3 seconds without interruption, she will toss a File:Samira_splash_coin.png coin in the direction she is facing.
If she has at least 1, the coin deals 1 true damage / true">Unknown value: ccs / 1 true damage / true to the first enemy champion hit, triggering Samira's Daredevil Impulse but granting them 1 of Samira's gold.
If cast within 1100 range of a visible enemy champion, Samira will turn to face towards the closest one to perform the animation.
Samira's Taunt can target and hit dead enemy champions, granting them 1 but not triggering other effects.
skills.targeting: Auto <!-- Missile says Location-targeted, but actually doesn't take any targeting input -->
skills.notes:
* '''Samira''' must have at least {{g|1}} to weaponize her Taunt animation. 
* Using her ''Taunt'' does '''not''' count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* {{si|Flash}} and {{ai|Wild Rush|Samira}} can be cast during her ''Taunt'', but neither interrupt the effect.{{bug}}
** If Samira's facing direction is changed before the coin is fired (e.g. by casting {{ai|Wild Rush|Samira}}), she will still turn toward her initial ''facing direction'' to toss the coin. Note: ''facing direction'', not toward the location of the target.
